channel.title: K9 Mail on TChilderhose
channel.description: Recent content in K9 Mail on TChilderhose

item.title: Connecting to ProtonMail Bridge with K-9 Mail on Android
item.description: Recently I decided to look into moving away from GMail and start using a different mail service and landed on ProtonMail. My one gripe is with their Android App is not great. So I wanted to see if I can use a more well-known mail client for Android, K-9 Mail.
